original: Choose any magical effect within 120ft. The spell that is creating that effect immediately ends (unless the targeted spell is immune to being dispelled). However, this only ends the spell’s effects. It does not undo the effects of the spell. For example, dispelling a Shape Liquid on an affected liquid will only prevent the caster from further manipulating the liquid. It will not unfreeze the liquid or change its shape back to normal.
translation: 可以选择120英尺内的任一魔法效果。产生该效果的魔法会被立刻终止（除非目标法术免疫驱魔效果）。但终止不等同于撤销魔法效果。举例而言，形变液体的施法者无法再继续让液体形状变化，但液体本身也无法回复被施法前的状态。

original: Point index finger at the target
